item.title: Hypermodern Python Chapter 4: Typing
item.description: Read this article on Medium In this fourth installment of the Hypermodern Python series, I’m going to discuss how to add type annotations and type checking to your project.1 Previously, we discussed how to add linting, static analysis, and code formatting. (If you start reading here, you can also download the code for the previous chapter.) Here are the topics covered in this chapter on Typing in Python:
